alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 5:29AM AKST until February 01 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with reduced visibility expected. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Wind chills to 40 below. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold wind chills will continue through tonight. Winds will increase today, with low visibility in blowing snow developing today. Low visibility in blowing snow will continue through Wednesday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
